by.htp.dao

Interface PatientDAO

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DBPatientDAO

    public interface PatientDAO
    Patients Data Access Object interface. Provides CRUD operations with Patient objects.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    D.Maniuk on 20.10.2019

      • getMedicationWithPeriosityAndTimestamp

        java.util.HashMap<java.lang.Integer,java.util.List<java.lang.Object>> getMedicationWithPeriosityAndTimestamp(int idUser)
                                                                                                      throws DAOException
        Find in the database medicines not given out on time.
        Parameters:
        idUser - is primary key of the user
        Returns:
        HashMap which contains array of objects of contents ordered by sampling order overdue primary key of the patient, dispense of medicine, time of dispensing of medicine.
        Throws:
        DAOException - - exception raised in DAO or connection pool
